title: MurderBoardTest
body:
->Add clue
    ->Add clue 0
        <<addClue MurderBoard zero>>
    ->Add clue 1
        <<addClue MurderBoard one>>
    ->Add clue 2
        <<addClue MurderBoard two>>
    ->Add clue 3
        <<addClue MurderBoard three>>
->Add suspect
    ->Add suspect Bill
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard bill>>
    ->Add suspect Elvis
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard elvis>>
    ->Add suspect Lego
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard lego>>
    ->Add suspect Zodiac
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard zodiac>>
->Connect clue to suspect
    ->Add clue 0...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 1...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 2...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 3...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three zodiac>>
